_comment2: This file can be used with any of the three miners:
_comment_threads: CPU miner only - number of mining threads
_comment_devices: GPU miners only - device indices to use (comma-separated in array)
_comment_security: Security: set to true to allow remote pool connections
_comment_difficulty: Minimum difficulty target (0 = use pool default)
_comment_benchmark: Run in benchmark mode (no pool connection)
_comment_intensity: Mining intensity - affects batch size (higher = more GPU/CPU usage)
_comment_protocol: Use Stratum V2 if supported by pool
_comment_auth: Optional Stratum authentication token (overrides 'pass' if set)
